understanding.C: We need to implement the Phase 2 normalization for the exec path so that GH013 errors stop occurring, while ensuring that DRY (dry-run) mode remains behaviorally identical (no output/format changes). The goal is to normalize exec inputs right before actual execution, not in DRY display paths, and add tests to lock in DRY behavior.

acceptance: Exec paths normalize inputs pre-run to avoid GH013; DRY mode output/behavior unchanged. Unit and integration tests added, all passing. CI lints no longer report GH013 for exec.
